name: 2024 The 8th International Conference on Education and Multimedia Technology
content: Conference Proceedings Publication: All submissions will be peer-reviewed. Accepted papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Journal Publication: All submissions will be peer-reviewed. Based on the topics, accepted papers will be accepted and published by International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET), which will be indexed by Scopus (CiteScore 2021: 1.3), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
